_header: Who set ever his foot aboven the seas wawe
Subjects: Sphinx, riddle of; riddles; sermons, verse in
_description: Riddle of the Sphinx, solved by Oedipus — two couplets

Lincoln44.Transcription:
Qwo set euer hys fote abouyn þe seys wawebot yf he it wete tw
                    red me þis sawHe þat in herth was born for synful mannys
                    bothhe may on þe se go and wete noght hys fothe
